attributes.action: end child poverty, ensure child maintainance is paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of Lone Parents in the U.K are not recieving any or irregular child maintainance payments.This is sabotaging the ability of lone parents to get back to work and is increasing child poverty in the U.K. We demand as a national priority for all political parties,government ensures these payments are made as a matter of urgency.
